HISTORY  AND  STRATEGIC   
STUDIES  
LAGOS  
      
  
   (v) GSU accepts NCE merit in History as Major subject.  
(vi) IBADAN accepts two (2) ‘A’ level/NCE passes in 
History and any other related subject.  
(vii) LAGOS requires very good passes in three (3) 
JUPEB/‘A’ level subjects, History  /or Government 
and any two (2) or one (1) of Igbo, Yoruba, CRS, IS, 
Literature in English, French, Music and Fine Arts.  
(viii) SAU accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Historyand 
Government, NCE credit in relevant subjects.  
(ix) NAU requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes in  
Historyand any other related subject.    
MAIDUGURI and UDU accept NCE merit pass level 
in relevant subjects.   
(x) UNN requires a minimum of five (5)‘O’ level 
creditpasses to include History or Government, 
English Language, and a science subject.  
  
UTME  
(iii) ABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include History or Government, English Language 
and three (3) other subjects in Arts or Social 
Sciences.  
(iv) FED-DUTSINMA accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credits 
to include Hist ory, English Language and 
Mathematics. A credit in Government may be 
considered in place of History.  
(v) FED-LAFIA requires credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, History/Government 
and any other relevant subjects.  
(vi) FED-LOKOJA requires five (5) ‘O’ level passes at 
credit level to include History or Government, 
English Language and other three from Arts or 
Social Sciences.  
(vii) IBADAN accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credits at one 
sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit at two (2) sittings  
 
REQUIREMENTS
